pr_title: DHFPROD-5067: Revert all changes to entity types

timeline.bodyText: Could you add this test in front of one of the current tests? For e2e testing, I think it's better to have longer tests that simulate real user interactions.
timeline.author: brucean52

timeline.bodyText: These actions can be in front of the save all entity test.
timeline.author: brucean52
